reviewText: Typical propaganda film for its day.  And, it is some what wrong.  The majority of atrocities committed by Japanese military units were actually done by Korean troops.  The demonizing of the Japanese army was the way to get more troops in the US Army.  But, like all armies of the world, there was only a percentage of troops that were bad.  In Japan's case, it was the Koreans.  They are brutal to themselves during a fight (ie Korean War), and they take the same brutality against others during a conflict, too..
